Rocket.​API.​Plugin.​IPluginManager
Rocket.​API.​Commands.​ICommandHandler
public interface
Rocket.​API.​Plugin.​IPluginManager
Functions
GetPlugin
IPlugin GetPlugin(
string name
)
PluginExists
bool PluginExists(
string name
)
ExecutePluginDependendCode
bool ExecutePluginDependendCode(
string pluginName,
ExecutePluginDependendCodeAction action
)

Executes code that depends on another plugin being available.  Because directly referencing another plugin breaks a plugin if the referenced plugin is unavailable you should pass the name of the expected plugin to this method and write all code dependend on that assembly inside of the delegate you pass to this method.

Example

pluginManager.ExecutePluginDependendCode("FancyFeast, (IRocketPlugin plugin) =>{ Feast pluginInstance = (Feast) plugin; pluginInstance.StartFeast(); });

Parameters
pluginName
string

Name of the plugin to look for

action
ExecutePluginDependendCodeAction

Delegate method to be invoked

Returns

If true then plugin was found and delegate executed
